title: IT'S HAPPENING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body:
http://puu.sh/spqjA/0df47251d5.jpg

Finally after almost a year! :D:D:D:D:D

https://i.imgur.com/7drHiqrh.jpg

replies.body:
Actually this is wrong. Last year they promised a "solo q" without "duos".
We had solo/duoq for 5 years till they went full retard and removed it. So, its nothing special.

Its like your mom took your favorite toy away by promising you something much better.
Then after a year she goes like, you know what, fuck that promise, here is your shitty toy again.

Some of us got over it ;) and no longer give a fuck
Pretty much this. This isn't an improvement at all, it's just getting back the same crap we've been complaining about since ever.

Dont play ranked!!!!! the matchmaking is fucked up ,really bad.Just had a game where matchmaking put 3 unrankeds on my team (2 of them had less than a 30% win ratio....) to play against golds...Yap ,thats totally fair.
That's flex queue MMR being weird. We're excited about solo/duoq where the MMR is fine! All my games are evenly matched now!

> [{quoted}](name=Fajisel,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QGTL7wAg,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-11-21T10:16:06.403+0000)
>
> That's flex queue MMR being weird. We're excited about solo/duoq where the MMR is fine! All my games are evenly matched now!

I dunno man... played soloQ ,get 3 unranked players with 30% win ratios on my team.We played against 3 mid golds and 2 high silvers.That doesnt sound balanced at all.
YEAH! JUMP RIGHT INTO THAT AND GET YOUR MMR REKT BY COLOSSUS ABUSE!

If you pick Colossus = it's abuse 
If you pick any ADC and any mastery suiting ADC then melt faces, because Riot keeps ADC strong = it's fine & balanced
